channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: There's too many warning to fix before this release. Making a blocker for 4.1.0.

Hi Ivan,
Lets split the work based on bug category. As bug count is 54 currently. Some might have addressed already.

Also my suggestion is to add exclude filter file to add any invalid bugs into it.

Actually, I have most of it done. I have about 36 more to do in hedwig-server. hedwig-protocol & hedwig-client are done (both were tiny). There's already a patch available to bookkeeper-server. bookkeeper-benchmark is still untouched if you want to look at that.
Thanks Ivan, for the deatils. I just filed a bug BOOKKEEPER-228 for BK Bench. You can assign that issue to me. I will take care of it.
I can't find your name on the assignee list :/ I'll ask the infra guys.
I have added Uma to the contributors list.
This patch fixes the findbugs in hedwig-*.

-----------------------------------------------------------

New patch. rebased to trunk and added findbugs exclude for findbugs for localdb persistence manager. This findbug cannot be fixed as there's no way to use an SQL parameter for a table in a query. I hash the topic to about SQL injections.
